headline: FactSet AI Push With Kepler Cheuvreux Meets Sliding Share Price
summary: FactSet Research Systems (NYSE:FDS) has partnered with Kepler Cheuvreux to bring its Aftermarket Research onto the FactSet platform, supported by FactSet's AI tools for European clients. The company has also launched a beta version of AI Doc Ingest for its Cobalt product to automate private capital data workflows using AI. FactSet Research Systems (NYSE:FDS), trading at $193.76, is rolling out these AI driven upgrades at a time when the stock has faced heavy pressure. The share price is...
